trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality required by text controls.
trans-unit.target: 實作文字控制項要求的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: This class implements the core features of text manipulation controls, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會實作核心功能的文字操作控制項，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: These include text selection, **Clipboard** functionality, multiline text control support, and many events.
trans-unit.target: 這些包括文字選取範圍，**剪貼簿**功能、 多行文字方塊控制項支援，以及許多事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, a derived class, to create a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>、 衍生類別，以建立多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>具有垂直捲軸控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。

trans-unit.source: You do not typically inherit from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不會從繼承<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase" />。

trans-unit.source: To create your own text control class, inherit from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立您自己的文字控制項類別，繼承自<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" />或<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing the TAB key in a multiline text box control types a TAB character in the control instead of moving the focus to the next control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出在多行文字方塊控制項中按 TAB 鍵時，在控制項中輸入的是 TAB 字元，而不是將焦點 (Focus) 移至定位順序的下一個控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if users can enter tabs in a multiline text box using the TAB key; <see langword="false" /> if pressing the TAB key moves the focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者可以用 TAB 鍵在多行文字方塊中輸入定位點，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果按 TAB 鍵會移動焦點，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property must also be `true` to get a TAB character in the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>屬性也必須`true`取得控制項中的定位字元。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A> property is set to `true`, the user must press CTRL+TAB to move the focus to the next control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>屬性設定為`true`，使用者必須按下 CTRL + TAB 鍵將焦點移至定位順序中的下一個控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, a derived class, to create a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control with vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>、 衍生類別，以建立多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>具有垂直捲軸控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>屬性，使多行文字方塊控制項適用於建立文字文件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab" /> 屬性的值已變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTabChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTabChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `TextBoxBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTabChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`TextBoxBase1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTabChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The text to append to the current contents of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 要附加於文字方塊目前的內容中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Appends text to the current text of a text box.
trans-unit.target: 將文字附加至文字方塊的目前文字中。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to add text to the existing text in the control instead of using the concatenation operator (+) to concatenate text to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法將文字加入至現有的文字，而不是使用串連運算子 （+） 來串連文字控制項中以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AppendText%2A> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.TextLength%2A> property to copy text from one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> to another.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AppendText%2A>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.TextLength%2A>屬性來從其中一個複製文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>到另一個。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls named, `textBox1` and `textBox2`, have been added to a form and that `textBox1` has text assigned to its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要有兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項名為，`textBox1`和`textBox2`，已新增至表單，`textBox1`文字指派給其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the control automatically adjusts when the font assigned to the control is changed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出當指定給控制項的字型變更時，控制項的高度是否要自動調整。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the height of the control automatically adjusts when the font is changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 當字型變更時，控制項的高度會自動調整，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AutoSize%2A> property to `true` for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> expands or contracts the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> to accommodate the larger or smaller text.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AutoSize%2A>屬性`true`如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>變更，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>展開或合約<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>以配合放大或縮小文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> does not change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>不會變更。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the size of the control as the user enters text, you can use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control and use its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ContentsResized> event to change its size.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更控制項的大小，在使用者輸入文字，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制，並使用其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ContentsResized>事件來變更其大小。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a form with two text boxes, two buttons, and click events for each of the buttons.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設您的表單具有兩個文字方塊中，兩個按鈕，並針對每個按鈕的 click 事件。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AutoSize%2A> property by setting it to `true` for one text box and `false` for the other.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AutoSize%2A>屬性設定為`true`一個文字方塊和`false`其他。

trans-unit.source: When you click one button the text boxes are filled with a smaller text, and when you click the other button the text boxes are filled with larger text.
trans-unit.target: 按一下其中一個按鈕的文字方塊會填入一個較小的文字，而且當您按一下其他按鈕的文字方塊會填入較大的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text box that has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AutoSize%2A> set to `true` expands in height to accommodate the larger text.
trans-unit.target: 文字方塊具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AutoSize%2A>設`true`會展開以容納較大的文字的高度。

trans-unit.source: The width does not change.
trans-unit.target: 寬度不會變更。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示控制項的背景。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A> property to change the background color of the text control to blend into the color scheme of your forms.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A>屬性來變更背景色彩的文字控制項融入您的表單的色彩配置。

trans-unit.source: To change the color of the text within the control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更控制項中文字的色彩，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A> property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear.
trans-unit.target: 設定時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A>屬性的文字控制項，可讓您確認您選擇的色彩不會消失控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A> properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A>屬性都設定為`Color.Black`，將不會顯示文字方塊控制項中的文字。

trans-unit.source: This property might be over ridden if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可能會透過寫如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>設`true`。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The background image for the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackgroundImage" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border type of the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字方塊控制項的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> that represents the border type of the text box control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" />，表示文字方塊控制項的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Fixed3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Fixed3D" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A> property to create borderless and flat style controls, in addition to the default three-dimensional control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A>建立無框線和一般樣式控制項，除了預設 3d 控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>, does not support the `BorderStyle.FixedSingle` style.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>，不支援`BorderStyle.FixedSingle`樣式。

trans-unit.source: This style will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle> to use the `BorderStyle.Fixed3D` style instead.
trans-unit.target: 此樣式會導致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle>使用`BorderStyle.Fixed3D`改用樣式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, a derived class, to create a text box that can properly display text using 20-point Arial with a single border.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>、 衍生類別，以建立可正確顯示 20 Arial 使用單一的框線與文字的文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A> property to determine the appropriate height of the control after the font and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A> have been assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.PreferredHeight%2A>屬性來判斷適當的控制項的高度之後字型和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle%2A>已指派給控制項。

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 不在列舉型別 (Enumeration) 有效值範圍內的值會指派給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyle" /> 屬性的值已變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `TextBoxBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`TextBoxBase1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BorderStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode" /> property can be set to an active value, to enable IME support.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode" /> 屬性是否可以設定為使用中的值，以啟用 IME 支援。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly" /> property is <see langword="true" /> or if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase" /> class is set to use a password mask character; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，或者這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase" /> 類別設定使用密碼遮罩字元，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user can undo the previous operation in a text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出使用者是否能復原在文字控制項中先前的作業。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can undo the previous operation performed in a text box control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者能夠復原先前在文字控制項中進行的作業，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Undo%2A> method to undo the last operation in a text box.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法傳回`true`，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Undo%2A>方法來復原上一個作業中的文字。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, or in code that manages the state of buttons on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> to enable or disable the ability to undo the previous operation in a text box control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>，或管理的按鈕狀態的程式碼中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>啟用或停用復原先前的作業中的文字方塊控制項的能力。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>、 衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: It provides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event handlers for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects that perform Cut, Copy, Paste, and Undo operations.
trans-unit.target: 它提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>剪下、 複製、 貼上，執行的物件，以及恢復作業。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control named `textBox1` has been created.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項，名為`textBox1`已建立。

trans-unit.source: Clears all text from the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 將所有文字從文字方塊控制項清除。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to clear the contents of the control instead of assigning the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，以清除控制項，而不是指派的內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>屬性是空字串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, a derived class, to create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>、 衍生類別，以建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The code within the event handler restricts data to numbers.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式中的程式碼會將資料限制為數字。

trans-unit.source: After text has been entered in the control, the code determines if the text entered is a number.
trans-unit.target: 在控制項中輸入文字之後，程式碼會判斷是否輸入的文字是數字。

trans-unit.source: If the text is not a number, the code clears the text from the control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> is displayed to alert the user that only numbers are accepted.
trans-unit.target: 如果文字不是數字，該程式碼會清除從控制項的文字和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>顯示來提醒使用者接受的數字。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that a `Boolean` variable named `flag` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control called `textBox1` are defined outside of this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要`Boolean`名為變數`flag`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項稱為`textBox1`定義在這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates how to use a flag variable to avoid a cascading event in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何使用旗標變數，以避免中的階層式事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Clears information about the most recent operation from the undo buffer of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 將與最近執行的作業有關的資訊從文字方塊的復原緩衝區清除。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to prevent an undo operation from repeating, based on the state of your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，以避免重複，復原作業在您的應用程式的狀態。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>、 衍生的類別。

trans-unit.target: 它提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>剪下、 複製、 貼上，執行的物件，以及恢復作業。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項，名為`textBox1`已建立。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the text box is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按一下文字方塊時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control called TextBox1.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例時，將下列程式碼貼中表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項稱為 TextBox1。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the event-handling method has been associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要已與相關聯的事件處理方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: Copies the current selection in the text box to the **Clipboard**.
trans-unit.target: 將文字方塊中目前的選取範圍複製到 [剪貼簿]。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method, instead of using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class, to copy text in the text box and place it in the **Clipboard**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，而不是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別，以在文字方塊中複製文字，並將它放在**剪貼簿**。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>、 衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: It provides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event handlers for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects that perform Cut, Copy, Paste, and Undo operations.
trans-unit.target: 它提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>剪下、 複製、 貼上，執行的物件，以及恢復作業。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control named `textBox1` has been created.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項，名為`textBox1`已建立。

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制項的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含建立控制項之控制代碼時所需的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: Moves the current selection in the text box to the **Clipboard**.
trans-unit.target: 將文字方塊中目前的選取範圍移至 [剪貼簿]。

trans-unit.source: This method will only cut text from the text box if text is selected in the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法將只当剪下文字從文字方塊控制項中選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method, instead of using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class, to copy text in the text box and move it to the **Clipboard**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，而不是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別，以在文字方塊中複製文字，並將它移至**剪貼簿**。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>、 衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: It provides <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event handlers for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects that perform Cut, Copy, Paste, and Undo operations.
trans-unit.target: 它提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>剪下、 複製、 貼上，執行的物件，以及恢復作業。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control named `textBox1` has been created.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項，名為`textBox1`已建立。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cursor for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的預設游標。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> representing the current default cursor.
trans-unit.target: 類型 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> 的物件，代表目前的預設資料指標。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.DefaultCursor%2A> to configure a default cursor for your control.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.DefaultCursor%2A>設定控制項的預設資料指標。

trans-unit.source: This is more efficient than setting the cursor in the control's constructor, and gives automatic support for certain cursor-related designer functions.
trans-unit.target: 這會更有效率，比在控制項的建構函式，設定資料指標，並提供自動支援特定資料指標相關的設計工具功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength" /> property is zero so that no characters are selected in the control.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectionLength" /> 屬性的值為零，使得控制項中不會選取任何字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether control drawing is done in a buffer before the control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項繪製是否在顯示該控制項之前於緩衝區內完成。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to implement double buffering on the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示在控制項上實作雙重緩衝 (Double Buffering)，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the control's foreground color.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示控制項的前景色彩。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A> property to change the color of the text within the control to match the text of other controls on your form.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A>屬性來變更以符合您的表單上其他控制項的文字在控制項中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to highlight a specific text box that contains an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性來反白顯示特定的文字方塊中包含無效的值。

trans-unit.source: To change the background color of the control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更控制項的背景色彩，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A> property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear.
trans-unit.target: 設定時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A>屬性的文字控制項，可讓您確認您選擇的色彩不會消失控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A> properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ForeColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.BackColor%2A>屬性都設定為`Color.Black`，將不會顯示文字方塊控制項中的文字。

trans-unit.source: This property might be over ridden if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可能會透過寫如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>設`true`。

trans-unit.source: The location from which to seek the nearest character.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中尋找最接近字元的位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the character that is closest to the specified location within the control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取最接近控制項內指定位置的字元。

trans-unit.source: The character at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置的字元。

trans-unit.source: If the location specified in the `pt` parameter is outside the client area of the control, the first character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的位置`pt`參數超出控制項字串中指定的點最接近的第一個字元的工作區`pt`傳回。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which characters are located near a specific point within the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來判斷哪些字元位於接近控制項內的特定時間點。

trans-unit.source: You can then use this value to perform operations on the text at that location.
trans-unit.target: 您接著可以使用此值在該位置的文字上執行作業。

trans-unit.source: If the specified location in the `pt` parameter is located on the right side of the client area of the control, the last character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的位置中`pt`參數位於右邊的控制項，也就是最後一個字元的字串中指定的點最接近的用戶端區域`pt`傳回。

trans-unit.source: The location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the character nearest to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 擷取最接近指定位置之字元的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based character index at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 指定位置處的以零為起始的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回最接近指定位置的字元索引`pt`參數。

trans-unit.source: The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces.
trans-unit.target: 字元索引為起始的索引中的控制項，包括空格的文字。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，以判斷其中文字中的使用者將滑鼠移過將滑鼠座標傳遞至這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是如果您想要執行的工作，使用者將滑鼠指標置於控制項的文字中的字時很有用。

trans-unit.source: If the specified location is not within the client rectangle of the control, or is beyond the last character in the control, the return value is the index of the last character.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的位置不是控制項的用戶端矩形內，或超出控制項中的最後一個字元，則傳回的值會是最後一個字元的索引。

trans-unit.source: The line for which to get the index of its first character.
trans-unit.target: 要取得其第一個字元之索引的字行。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the first character of a given line.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定行第一個字元的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first character in the specified line.
trans-unit.target: 指定行中第一個字元的以零起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Line numbering in the text box starts at zero.
trans-unit.target: [文字] 方塊中的行號從零開始。

trans-unit.source: If the `lineNumber` parameter is greater than the last line in the text box, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.GetFirstCharIndexFromLine%2A> returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果`lineNumber`參數大於中文字方塊的最後一行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.GetFirstCharIndexFromLine%2A>傳回-1。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.GetFirstCharIndexFromLine%2A> returns the first character index of a physical line.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.GetFirstCharIndexFromLine%2A> 傳回實體的一行的第一個字元索引。

trans-unit.source: The physical line is the displayed line, not the assigned line.
trans-unit.target: 實體的行是顯示的行，而不是指派的行。

trans-unit.source: The number of displayed lines can be greater than the number of assigned lines due to word wrap.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的行數可能會大於因為自動換行的指定行數。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you assign two long lines to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control and set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> to `true`, the two long assigned lines result in four physical (or displayed lines).
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您指派至兩個長行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制以及設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>至`true`，兩個長指派的線條會產生四個實體 （或顯示線條）。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="lineNumber" /> parameter is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lineNumber" /> 參數的值小於零。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the first character of the current line.
trans-unit.target: 擷取目前這行第一個字元的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based character index in the current line.
trans-unit.target: 目前字行中以零為起始的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: The character index position to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的字元索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the line number from the specified character position within the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取控制項文字內指定字元位置的行號。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based line number in which the character index is located.
trans-unit.target: 字元索引所在處的以零為起始的行號。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您判斷在指定的字元索引為基礎的行號`index`方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: The first line of text in the control returns the value zero.
trans-unit.target: 控制項中文字的第一行會傳回值為零。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A> method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A>方法傳回的實體的行號索引的字元所在控制項中。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A> method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果第一個邏輯程式敘述行中的文字部分控制項換行至下一行，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A>方法會傳回 1，如果第二個實體的行換行字元的指定的索引處的字元。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>設`false`、 行的任何部分換行至下一步，而且方法會傳回 0，表示指定的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來判斷哪一行特定的字元索引位於內。

trans-unit.source: For example, after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在呼叫之後<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法來搜尋的文字，您可以取得找到的搜尋結果的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method with the character index returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to determine which line the word was found.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫這個方法所傳回的字元索引與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>找不到方法，以判斷這行文字。

trans-unit.source: If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定的字元索引`index`參數超出可用的控制項中包含的行數，會傳回最後一個行號。

trans-unit.source: The index of the character for which to retrieve the location.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取位置的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the location within the control at the specified character index.
trans-unit.target: 擷取控制項內指定之字元索引的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of the specified character within the client rectangle of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項之用戶端矩形內指定字元的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine where in the control a specific character index is located.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您判斷在控制項中特定的字元索引所在位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method for such tasks as displaying shortcut menu items or help information for a word in the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法針對在控制項中顯示快顯功能表項目或說明資訊 word 等工作。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you wanted to display a menu of options to the user when the user right clicks on a word in the control, you can use this method to determine the position of the word to properly display a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要向使用者顯示選項功能表，當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下控制項中文字時，可以使用此方法判斷才能正確顯示文字的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selected text in the text box control remains highlighted when the control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出當控制項遺失駐點時，這個值會表示文字方塊控制項中選取的文字是否還是會以反白顯示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the selected text does not appear highlighted when the text box control loses focus; <see langword="false" />, if the selected text remains highlighted when the text box control loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果文字方塊控制項遺失駐點時，選取的文字不會以反白顯示，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果文字方塊控制項遺失駐點時，選取的文字還是以反白顯示，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to keep text highlighted in a text box control while another form or a dialog box has focus, such as a spelling checker dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來保留另一個表單或對話方塊焦點時，例如拼字檢查程式對話方塊中，文字方塊控制項中反白的文字。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.HideSelection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.HideSelection%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: 要執行此範例，將下列程式碼貼在表單中。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeTextBox` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`InitializeTextBox`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.HideSelection" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.HideSelection" /> 屬性的值已變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.HideSelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.HideSelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `TextBoxBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.HideSelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`TextBoxBase1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.HideSelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode of a control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的輸入法 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: The IME mode of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的 IME 模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the Keys value.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 Keys 值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is an input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是輸入按鍵還是需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is an input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的按鍵是輸入按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.IsInputKey%2A> method returns `true` when the `keyData` parameter includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Tab> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.IsInputKey%2A>方法會傳回`true`時`keyData`參數包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Tab>值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.IsInputKey%2A> returns `false` if `keyData` contains both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Tab> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Control>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.IsInputKey%2A> 傳回`false`如果`keyData`同時包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Tab>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Control>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lines of text in a text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字方塊控制項中的文字行數。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that contains the text in a text box control.
trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，包含文字方塊控制項中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Each element in the array becomes a line of text in the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 陣列中的每個項目會變成文字方塊控制項中文字行。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property of the text box control is set to `true` and a newline character appears in the text, the text following the newline character is added to a new element in the array and displayed on a separate line.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>文字方塊控制項的屬性設定為`true`和文字顯示新行字元、 新行字元之後的文字加入新陣列中的項目，並顯示在個別行上。

trans-unit.source: By default, the collection of lines is a read-only copy of the lines in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，線條的集合是唯讀複本中線條的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To get a writable collection of lines, use code similar to the following: `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };`
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的線條可寫入的集合，使用程式碼如下所示： `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };`

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, a derived class, to extract all strings of text from a multiline text box control and displays them using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>、 衍生類別，以擷取多行文字方塊控制項中的所有文字字串，並將它們顯示使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control has been created, named `textBox1`, and that it has been filled with lines of text.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>已經建立控制項，名為`textBox1`，且已填入的文字行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters the user can type or paste into the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者能夠輸入或貼入文字方塊控制項中的最大字元數。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters that can be entered into the control.
trans-unit.target: 可以輸入控制項中的字元數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 32767.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 32767。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，或限制的輸入資料時資料庫中輸入的文字長度來限制在控制項中輸入的值，例如郵遞區號和電話號碼、 文字的長度。

trans-unit.source: You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database.
trans-unit.target: 您可以限制的最大長度，在資料庫中對應欄位的輸入控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: In code, you can set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在程式碼中，您可以設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>屬性值的長度大於所指定的值，這個值以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects text entered into the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響執行階段輸入控制項的文字。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, to create a text box that is used to accept a password.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，以建立用來接受密碼文字方塊。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to change all characters typed to uppercase and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to restrict the password length to eight characters.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>以大寫輸入變更的所有字元的屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>屬性，以將密碼長度限制為 8 個字元。

trans-unit.source: This example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A> property to center the password in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign%2A>屬性中心中的密碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指派給屬性的值小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the text box control has been modified by the user since the control was created or its contents were last set.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出在建立控制項或者上次設定其內容後，文字方塊控制項被使用者修改過。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control's contents have been modified; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項的內容已修改過，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine if the user has modified the contents of the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷使用者是否已修改文字方塊控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property in code to indicate that changes were made to the text box control by the application.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定這個屬性來表示，已變更文字方塊控制項的應用程式的程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used by validation and data-saving methods to determine if changes were made in a text box control so the changed contents can be validated or saved.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用於驗證和資料儲存方法判斷文字方塊控制項中所做變更，如此才能驗證或儲存變更的內容。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property programmatically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified%2A> property reverts to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified%2A>屬性還原成`false`。

trans-unit.source: This does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ModifiedChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ModifiedChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged> event for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, a derived class, to determine if the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control have changed since the control was filled with data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>、 衍生類別，以判斷內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項已填入資料之後，變更控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a string to store the original contents of the control and compares it against the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> to determine if the contents have changed.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用字串來儲存控制項的原始內容，並進行比較的內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>來判斷是否已變更內容。

trans-unit.source: If the contents have changed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果內容已變更，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is reset to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會重設，為`false`。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control named `textBox1` has been created and that a `String` variable named `originalText` has been created to store the original text for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項，名為`textBox1`已建立且`String`名為變數`originalText`已建立儲存的原始文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified" /> 屬性的值已變更時。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property programmatically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified%2A> property reverts to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Modified%2A>屬性還原成`false`。

trans-unit.source: This does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ModifiedChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 這不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ModifiedChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ModifiedChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ModifiedChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `TextBoxBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ModifiedChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`TextBoxBase1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ModifiedChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 發生於以滑鼠按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control does not raise a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Click> event for right clicks.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Click>以滑鼠右鍵按一下事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MouseClick> event provides the functional equivalent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MouseClick>事件提供功能的對等項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MouseClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出這是否為多行文字方塊控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is a multiline text box control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是多行文字方塊控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A multiline text box allows you to display more than one line of text in the control.
trans-unit.target: 多行文字方塊中，可讓您在控制項中顯示多行的文字。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> property is set to `true`, text entered into the multiline text box is wrapped to the next line in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>屬性設定為`true`，在多行文字方塊中輸入的文字換行至下一行控制項中。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> property is set to `false`, text entered into the multiline text box control will be displayed on the same line until a newline character is entered.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>屬性設定為`false`，輸入新行字元之前，將在同一行顯示多行文字方塊控制項中輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: The following can be used as newline characters:
trans-unit.target: 下列可用來當作新行字元：

trans-unit.source: ControlChars.CrLf
trans-unit.target: ControlChars.CrLf

trans-unit.source: vbCrLf (Visual Basic only)
trans-unit.target: vbCrLf (僅限 Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: You can add scroll bars to a text box using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> property to display horizontal and/or vertical scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入文字 方塊中，使用捲軸<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>屬性來顯示水平和/或垂直捲軸。

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to scroll through the text that extends beyond the dimensions of the control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓使用者捲動文字超出控制項的維度。

trans-unit.source: Because the default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property is `false`, the default size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> will be in accordance with the font size even if you resize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 因為預設值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>屬性是`false`的預設大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>即使您調整的大小會根據字型大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To get a consistent size for your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得針對大小一致您<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，將其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: On Japanese operating systems, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property is set to `true`, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property will display the text of the password, thus compromising system security.
trans-unit.target: 在日文作業系統，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>屬性設定為`true`，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>屬性會顯示密碼，進而危損害系統安全性的文字。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, on Japanese operating systems, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property to `false` if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，日文作業系統在系統上，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>屬性`false`如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to `false` by default for all derived classes, with the exception of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定為`false`依預設，所有衍生類別，除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property affects whether or not the control will automatically resize, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會影響是否控制項將會自動調整大小，，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> will not automatically resize.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>設`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>設`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>並不會自動調整大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to `true` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> will automatically resize.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>設`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Multiline%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>設`false`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>將自動調整大小。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 發生於重繪控制項時。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。
